thread.title: Boutique, Luxury Travel Website Time Travel Holiday, Announces the Launch of New Company Website
thread.title_full: Boutique, Luxury Travel Website Time Travel Holiday, Announces the Launch of New Company Website

author: prbuzz.com
title: Boutique, Luxury Travel Website Time Travel Holiday, Announces the Launch of New Company Website
text:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE
August 31, 15—Time Travel Holiday, an established leader in helping travelers find an all inclusive travel package in one place with ease, announced the launch of a new company website today to be a portal of information for travel planning that is safe, secure, and convenient. The website can be viewed at http://www. Timetravelholiday.com .
According to Time Travel Holiday Founder, Wen Po Foe, the website is live and constantly updated with the best available packages. The website also is available 24/7 and includes a live chat feature to help guests find everything they need to book the best and most affordable unique travel experience possible as described by Mr. Foe.
"We are very pleased with the look, feel, and usability of our new website," said Foe. "Our customers will now be able to easily search the website for a destination and activity anywhere they wish to travel. In addition, we think our customers will enjoy how easy it is to use our website and work with one of our travel specialist to help with every aspect of the planning process," added Mr. Foe.
More Time Travel Holiday
Founded in 2011, Time Travel Holiday has helped many clients plan and execute unique boutique travel experiences. The company's mission statement is, "To help travelers find better travel itineraries in one place with the comfort of having a, secure and convenient experience anytime and anywhere through a holistic approach.” The website specializes in personalized and cost effective services, customized vacations, romantic getaways, religious and adventure group tours. They provide customers with outstanding customer service along with unmatched levels of local expertise and luxury.
Time Travel Holiday caters to all travel needs, whether it is a first time visit, touring holiday, business trip or a quick trip to see friends and family. The company has access to a wide travel product portfolio from all around the world. They offer niche touring, exclusive tours and exclusive group departures as well as traditional products such as flights, car rentals and attractions. The client creates and tailors their own destination, style of accommodation, mode of travel and experience to ensure the combination is just right for them.
Time Travel Holiday agents can genuinely offer a world of experience. They all have a longstanding record of interest and passion for travel and will give guests the peace of mind that usually comes only from booking with a luxury travel agent. They are only a phone call, live chat or email away and ready to provide a round the clock service when clients need it. The agents are willing to do everything possible to make sure that travelers visiting the site are well looked after like VIPs.
Guests can choose from a huge range of packages from accommodations, cars, flights options and tours & attractions. To compliment their product ranges, the website has a team of experienced, dedicated travel professionals on hand to deliver it to client. To learn more about Time Travel Holiday, visit them online at http://www.timetravelholiday.com.
